Is he healthy?
Need to read “the great cholesterol myth”
You literally have nothing to worry about. Those are top 10% kind of numbers to aim for
High by today's standard. Used to be 300 was normal

Watch these doctors, it's well worth the time.
https://www.youtube.com/live/XfJNUbJE_V0?feature=share
High Cholesterol is Healthy! [with David Diamond, PhD]
YOUTUBE.COM
High Cholesterol is Healthy! [with David Diamond, PhD]
High Cholesterol is Healthy! [with David Diamond, PhD]

Ask for LP(a) , VLDL oxidized LDL, HS CRP, fasting insulin and ApoB testing
TGs are generally a proxy for other good blood markers and yours are great (mine are also always in the 50s but my HDL is currently lower than I'd like due to a drug I'm taking)
